auth.loginRequired.title: Last War Command Center
auth.loginRequired.message: You need to be signed in to view this page.
auth.brand.tagline: Track your heroes, buildings, and research in one place.
auth.brand.description: This Command Center is a fan-made helper tool. It does not connect to game servers and never asks for your game login. You only create a simple email-based profile for this site.
auth.brand.signInHint: Sign in to keep your progress saved.
auth.brand.guestHint: Or start a guest session to explore without creating an account.
auth.mode.login.title: Sign In
auth.mode.login.subtitle: Access your Command Center profile.
auth.field.email.label: Email Address
auth.field.password.label: Password
guest.info.blurb: Guest mode lets you explore the Command Center quickly. Data will not be saved after closing your browser.
